thread.title: Finally, a service oriented hotel in NY - Review
thread.title_full: Finally, a service oriented hotel in NY - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sandeepb2011
title: Finally, a service oriented hotel in NY - Review
text:
For person coming from Asia, I always found NY hotels could do with a better service orientation. The Pierre did positively surprise me. Could well be the Taj touch.
The rooms are both spacious and luxurious. The housekeeping prompt.
Got a fruit basket on arrival, which I always welcome. Wish they would keep some fruit on all days. They Gym is well equipped, though some equipments could do with an overhaul. I really liked the bar, it has a good whiskey collection. The bartender surprised me with some excellent cocktails.
